WarpLocation.Description: 'default' places the warp one tile below the bunny statue on SVE and vanilla maps. 'Custom' allows the warp point to be moved around on the farm. 'Grandpa's Shed' moves the warp point off the farm. Selecting 'Grandpa's Shed' when playing on an SVE farm map will be the same as selecting 'default'.

EnchantedGroveWarpX.Description: Select the X coordinate for the warp point. Only matters when picking 'custom' for WarpLocation.

EnchantedGroveWarpY.Description: Select the Y coordinate for the warp point. Only matters when picking 'custom' for WarpLocation.

SeasonalEdits.Description: Adds leaves to all building roofs during fall and snow to many objects during winter (fences, stop signs, plants, etc). Automatically adjusts colors if players have Starblue Valley or Eemie recolors installed.

ReplaceDefaultFences.Description: Replaces the standard fences with the matching static fences found throughout exterior locations. Automatically adjusts colors if players have Starblue Valley or Eemie recolors installed.

ReplaceHardwoodFences.Description: Replaces the hardwood fences with the matching static fences found throughout exterior locations. Automatically adjusts colors if players have Starblue Valley or Eemie recolors installed.

ImmersiveShadows.Description: Adds shadows to buildings and large objects in the world.

MistEffects.Description: Adds mist during rainy days to many maps. This does impact performance, so disable this if you're experiencing lag on rainy days.

SVECommunityBundles.Description: Adds SVE objects to community center bundles. Doesn't affect remixed bundles and only applies on a newly created save file.

HardSVECommunityBundles.Description: Adds SVE objects to community center bundles and makes them more difficult. Doesn't affect remixed bundles and only applies on a newly created save file.

RetexturedFarmhouseKitchen.Description: Redesigns the players kitchen sets for all farmhouse upgrades.

RemoveWineryDecorations.Description: Removes all the permanent decorations present in the winery farm building, allowing players to place their own decor or machines.

OriginalMinesEntrance.Description: Adds back the original mine entrance at the mountain, cutting down time it takes players to walk to the mines.

AlternativeCraftables.Description: Changes the design of the furnace, kiln, beehives, kegs, seed machine, cheese machine, and mayonnaise machine.

RemoveObjectsFromGrandpasShed.Description: Removes static plants, boxes, flowers, and barrels from the greenhouse interior.

RemoveSouthernCactusesFromDesert.Description: Removes a number of catuses in Calico Desert, allowing easier placement of objects such as kegs.

DisableSVEJojaMartShop.Description: Removes SVE Joja Shop patches, giving other mods editing the vanilla shop priority.

BalancedCrafting.Description: Crafting requires more/different resources. Some craftables are easier to make. Recommended if players are using the /“Automation/” mod and/or IF2R to balance resource intake.

HarderBuildingConstruction.Description: Constructing buildings cost more resources and money.

StrongerMonsters.Description: Monsters receive a significant buff in damage dealt to players (double), with slight increases in HP. Shadow Brutes and Mummies have large HP and damage buffs.

ChallengingMarshlands.Description: Increases spawns of ghost waves and swamp golems in the Forbidden Maze. Players can find even more forage.

ChallengingHighlandsCavern.Description: Increases monster spawns. Players can find even more gems and minerals.

ChallengingBadlands.Description: Dramatically increases monster spawns and difficulty traversing the Crimson Badlands - the adventurer's true test. This toggle is very resource intensive, so having a strong PC is recommended.

LowMemoryBadlands.Description: Massively reduces monster spawns in the Crimson Badlands to conserve memory for weak devices.

LowMemoryHighlands.Description: Massively reduces monster spawns in the Highlands to conserve memory for weak devices.

VanillaSandyPortraits.Description: Removes SVE Sandy portraits, giving other mods editing the vanilla Sandy portraits priority.

MatureEvents.Description: Adds an additional 10 events that contain extremely serious topics, dark undertones, and moral ambiguity. If players wish to play SVE with these events, they must consent via toggling the configuration to /“true/”.

ShorterPathToBlueMoonVineyard.Description: Pushes the warp point from Cindersap Forest > Blue Moon Vineyard closer to Fairhaven Farm, cutting down on travel time.

GaldoranGemMuseumMoveable.Description: Allows the Galdoran Gem to be donated to the Stardew Valley Museum. Prevents players from getting soft locked after the item type change in the SVE 1.15.5 update if it was already donated and they attempted to move it to another spot.

UseGaldoranThemeAllTimes.Description: Changes the Stardew Valley region UI to the Galdoran region UI in all locations.

DisableGaldoranTheme.Description: Disables the Galdoran UI in all locations. Useful if players have a mod already editing the UI.
